task.title: Requesting a Release of Object Lock
task.shortdesc: If an object is locked and you would like to edit it, you can request the release of an object lock.

taskbody.context: When you click on a locked object, a banner appears stating that the object is locked by a CWRC member and that you have the option of request that they unlock the object.

step.cmd: Click on request that they unlock the object.

taskbody.result: A message is sent to the person who has the lock on this object.
